channel.title: Comments on: Hiking my first volcano – Madera, Isla De Ometepe
channel.description: my little place on the web

item.title: By: Erica
item.dc:creator: Erica
item.description: Oh I'm so jealous! I went to the Isla de Ometempe, but didn't have enough time to climb the volcanoes. I'm glad you did so I could read about it and live vicariously through you- even if it didn't turn out to be as glamorous as it might sound.
item.content:encoded: Oh I’m so jealous! I went to the Isla de Ometempe, but didn’t have enough time to climb the volcanoes. I’m glad you did so I could read about it and live vicariously through you- even if it didn’t turn out to be as glamorous as it might sound.
